apps.name: Stremio
apps.changelog: KSPlayer now shows embedded subtitles properly\niPhone 11 Pro Max, iPhone XS Max devices would show huge gap in discover Rotation issue in KSPlayer\n(Can be disabled in iOS Settings -> Apps -> Stremio)
apps.versionDescription: KSPlayer now shows embedded subtitles properly\niPhone 11 Pro Max, iPhone XS Max devices would show huge gap in discover Rotation issue in KSPlayer\n(Can be disabled in iOS Settings -> Apps -> Stremio)
apps.subtitle: Stremio- Freedom to Stream

versions.localizedDescription: KSPlayer now shows embedded subtitles properly\niPhone 11 Pro Max, iPhone XS Max devices would show huge gap in discover Rotation issue in KSPlayer\n(Can be disabled in iOS Settings -> Apps -> Stremio)

* feat(player): adapt player to macOS/iPadOS cursor \n* refactor: Library dynamic filters. (Now shows channels and etc in filter)\n* refactor(MetaItem) (Click and hold continue watching, library, and other catalog items to see dropdown)

Please do not report about P2P addons not working as it is intended and NOT a bug. Use Github to submit issues as I could get back to you if I have further questions

New KSPlayer implementation:
You could switch back to VLC player as KSPlayer implementation is Unstable for now.

Changes:
* iOS 16 and lower crashes when add-on fetches URL with 'l' character path in it:
Fixed by removing force unwrapping of
String to URL.
Fixed?: Discover becomes empty after using filters
Refactor: New design for Filter in discover, library, and etc.

Testing:
Please from now on use both GitHub and Feedback(for sending crash logs automatically with GitHub name) so that way it would be easier to communicate and test.
Player will be updated in 1.0.1 version.
